exercises.title: System Info
exercises.description: Print: hostname, current user, home directory, shell, and whether you're root.
exercises.descriptionHtml: Print: hostname, current user, home directory, shell, and whether you're root.
exercises.solution:
func main() {
    hostname, _ := os.Hostname()
    u, _ := user.Current()
    shell := os.Getenv("SHELL")
    isRoot := os.Geteuid() == 0
    
    fmt.Println("Hostname:", hostname)
    fmt.Println("User:", u.Username)
    fmt.Println("Home:", u.HomeDir)
    fmt.Println("Shell:", shell)
    fmt.Println("Root:", isRoot)
}
